value.name: Zend_Search_Lucene
value.description: pure PHP robust, general purpose text search engine

value.body:
I reverted all 1.5 changes for branch 1.0...
Now almost all should be fixed, except Lucene

There are even some more now:

There were 58 errors:

1) testFailedCreation(Zend_CurrencyTest)
Zend_Locale_Exception: Autodetection of Locale has been failed!
/home/sebastian/Work/ZendFramework-1.0/library/Zend/Locale.php:906
/home/sebastian/Work/ZendFramework-1.0/library/Zend/Currency.php:427
/home/sebastian/Work/ZendFramework-1.0/library/Zend/Currency.php:84
/home/sebastian/Work/ZendFramework-1.0/tests/Zend/CurrencyTest.php:263

2) testGetTimestamp(Zend_DateTest)
